body: Global Website                              Select Language                                                        English           日本語                                                                                                                                                     Consumers                       Consumers Top            Promotions            Travel            Platinum Members            On Card Usage                      Businesses                       Businesses Top            Card Issuing            Merchant Acquiring                      Merchants                       Merchants Top            Merchant Requirements            Start Accepting JCB Cards                      Products                       Products Top            Cards            Payment solution            Security                      Press           About Us                       About Us Top            What We Do            CEO Message            JCB Brand Concept            Our Company            Sponsorship            History                      Select Language                       English            日本語                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           As the only Japan based international brand, we provide an unparalleled experience for our partners and their customers.                                                                                            What We Do For You          JCB is the only international payment brand based in Japan. We offer high quality payment solution and technologies that are trusted worldwide.          Learn More                                                           Recommended JCB Member Benefits       From shopping perks to concierge services, JCB cardmembers have access to an array of exclusive benefits.                                                                            JCB PLAZA           JCB PLAZA is an overseas service counter available at locations around the world. The JCB PLAZA staff will be happy to help you with making reservations at JCB merchants and to answer any questions you may have about your travels.           Find your way                                                                                JCB Promotions           Our newest promotions for JCB customers including discounts and special offers on products and services around the world.           Get Promotions information                                                                                Welcome to Japan           JCB offers a variety of services and promotions in Japan.We hope you bring your JCB card along on your Japan trip.           Learn More                                                                                JCB Platinum Services           JCB Platinum cardholders have access to over 61 international airport lounges and exclusive hotel, restaurant, golf, and car rental services.
